docs.text:
MkDocs for creating mkdocs cause without them this documentation would not be possible

squidfunk for creating mkdocs-material the theme that this site uses
docs.title: We would like to thank these people for the projects that powers this documentation

docs.text:
Change cookie settings

By accessing our site you agree that your actions may be recorded via cookies so we can make this site better.

You can change your settings via the button above
docs.title: Privacy Policy

docs.text:
When you try to log onto the server you will be greeted by a message like the one shown below

Please follow the instructions below

Instructions

  1. You DM Carrier Pidgeon#8937 (our DiscordSRV bot) the code that is shown to you
  2. Once you have sent the message to the bot you will be granted entry to the server
  3. ✨ Have Fun!
docs.title: How to link your Discord account to your minecraft account
Here are the ranks with the commands and permissions that are associated with them

docs.text:
• /warp (this includes listing all the warps)
  • /back
  • /bal
  • /delhome
  • /disposal
  • /echest
  • /home (this includes bed and compass)
  • /kit
  • /mail
  • /msg
  • /nick
  • /pay
  • /sell
  • /sethome (this includes bed and the limit of 3)
  • /spawn
  • /suicide
  • /tpa
  • /tpacancel
  • /tpaccept
  • /tpdeny
  • /workbench
  • /crawl
  • /lay
  • /sit
  • /sitcommand
  • /sitplayer
  • /sittogle
docs.title: Member

docs.text:
• Access to all glow colors
  • Unlimited homes
  • more chat formats
  • access to more plot features (when we release that again)

More-soon

There will be more stuff added to the Bread Baker rank as we go along
docs.title: Other perms

docs.text:
First click the button that looks like the one that is circled below

Then you should see message that looks like the one in the image below

Next grab the code from that message and put into Discord like shown below
docs.title: How to link your BreadCraft site account to your Discord account
Congrats your Discord and BreadCraft site accounts are now linked
